content.shortDescription: Supply a given asset on Aave
content.longDescription: Supply a given asset on AaveV3 on a given chain. The user needs to provide the asset to supply, the amount of the asset to supply and the chain to supply the asset on. Users will typically supply assets on Aave to earn a yield by providing liquidity to the protocol. Aave is a leading DeFi lending protocol for providing liquidity to borrowers.

variables.name: amount
variables.description: The amount of the asset to supply

variables.name: chain
variables.description: The chain to supply the asset on

clic.description: Call the encodeSupplyParams view function on the L2Encoder contract to encode the supply parameters into a bytes32 value that will be used in the subsequent supply write contract call.

functionArgs.name: asset
functionArgs.description: The contract address of the asset to supply

functionArgs.name: amount
functionArgs.description: The amount of the asset to supply

functionArgs.name: referralCode
functionArgs.description: The referral code to use if any or 0 if no referral code is used

clic.description: Call the supply function on the AaveV3 L2 Pool contract to supply the asset using the encoded parameters from step 1.
